code: public void testToXContentSerialiationWithSortedFields() throws Exception {     ShardRouting shardRouting = TestShardRouting.newShardRouting("foo", 0, "node_id", true, ShardRoutingState.STARTED).     Segment segment = new Segment("my").     SortField sortField = new SortField("foo", SortField.Type.STRING).     sortField.setMissingValue(SortField.STRING_LAST).     segment.segmentSort = new Sort(sortField).     ShardSegments shardSegments = new ShardSegments(shardRouting, Collections.singletonList(segment)).     IndicesSegmentResponse response = new IndicesSegmentResponse(new ShardSegments[] { shardSegments }, 1, 1, 0, Collections.emptyList()).     try (XContentBuilder builder = jsonBuilder()) {         response.toXContent(builder, ToXContent.EMPTY_PARAMS).     } }
